events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon involving a rear-end collision on the highway.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial incident report and involved parties' vehicle details.
An insurance agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to assist the claimant throughout the process.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the accident claim and assured prompt handling.
The claimant was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and driver’s license for verification.
All requested documentation including accident photos, police report, and claim form have been received successfully.
The investigation into the collision details and liability has commenced with the appointed claims investigator.
Investigation concluded confirming the claimant was not at fault, and the other party’s insurance is liable.
A settlement amount for the vehicle repairs and related expenses has been proposed and communicated to the customer.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and timely communication from the insurance team.
The claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement terms by the insured party.
Payment was successfully processed and transferred to the claimant’s account to cover car repair costs.
The claim file was closed after confirming the claimant was satisfied with the payment and resolution.
The complete claim documentation and correspondence were archived for future reference and compliance.
